name: Cleopatra VII
what_did:
Cleopatra was the last pharaoh of Ancient Egypt.
She was very smart and spoke many languages.
She worked with powerful Roman leaders like Julius Caesar and Mark Antony to protect Egypt.
why_matters:
Cleopatra was one of the most famous female rulers in history.
She tried to keep Egypt strong during a time of great change.
Her life shows how powerful women could be in the ancient world.

options: Speaking many languages and leading Egypt

questions.q: What kind of ruler was Cleopatra?

options: It became part of the Roman Empire
She gave it to her brother

fun_fact: Cleopatra may have written books about medicine and science!
